outline:
1. to kill, slay, murder, destroy, murderer, slayer, out of hand
    1. (Qal)
      1. to kill, slay
      2. to destroy, ruin
    2. (Niphal) to be killed
    3. (Pual) to be killed, be slain
kjv_def: destroy, out of hand, kill, murder(-er), put to (death), make (slaughter), slay(-er), [idiom] surely.
